SELECT p.prod_code , prod_name , prod_color , prod_size , prod_price , cart_quantity , c.prod_option_code FROM tbl_product p JOIN tbl_prod_option po ON po.prod_code = p.prod_code JOIN tbl_cart c ON c.prod_option_code = po.prod_option_code JOIN tbl_user u ON u.user_code = c.user_code WHERE c.user_code = #{userCode}
